# Simple Templates
## Overview
**Simple Templates:** Simple templates can be applied during the game with minimal effort. This makes it easy, for example, to deal with celestial and fiendish creatures conjured in the heat of battle by *summon monster* spells.

**Source:** Bestiary 1, pg. 295
